availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Johnathan Ward (Johnson County, Kentucky, laborer and prisoner)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, laborer and prisoner. Kentucky native. Charged with manslaughter in Johnson County, Kentucky, in January 1857. Sentenced to the Kentucky State Penitentiary from January 1857 to January 1867. Laborer imprisoned in the Kentucky State Penitentiary in Frankfort, Kentucky, in 1860. Reported escaped from prison on March 28, 1863, and returned March 30, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 287.
KYR-0001-004-0363.
